text: Sarju Sagar Dam also known as Kot Dam is a dam across the Shakambhari Hills. It is situated 13 kilometres from Udaipurwati town in Jhunjhunu, Rajasthan, India. The dam was constructed between 1923 and1924 for the purposes of Irrigation and Water Storage. == Gallery == == References == == External links == * http://jhunjhunu.rajasthan.gov.in Category:Dams in Rajasthan Category: Jhunjhunu district Category:1924 establishments in India Category:Tourist attractions in Jhunjhunu district
title: Sarju Sagar Dam
